title: Running small projects
desc:
This course will give you a practical understanding of the project management process associated with smaller projects. It offers guidance and tips on good project methodology and the skills to effectively lead or deliver smaller projects.

This 1-day course complements other e-learning and workshops on project delivery available from Civil Service Learning.

outcomes.blurb: On completing this learning, youâ€™ll be able to:
points: understand the terms and processes used in projects and determine the best approaches, tools and techniques to use
identify the tasks, timeframes and people issues involved in projects
use simple planning and progress measuring tools and identify outcomes and means of measuring and sharing success
